nodes.text: Nothing Beats an Academy Education was a propaganda poster drawn by an unknown artist during the Age of the Empire. It depicted a stormtrooper flanked by a TIE fighter pilot to their right and a scout trooper to the left, with the words "Stand with the best. Enroll today!" It acted as a recruitment poster for the Imperial Academy.

Nothing Beats an Academy Education is one of several in-universe propaganda artworks in the book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy. It was also shown on the final cover for the book, albeit with the text replaced with the title of the book.
